summary: THE HVAC BLOWER MOTOR RESISTOR ASSEMBLY MELTED ON THE VEHICLE.   THE CURRENT PASSING THROUGH THE UNIT IS SUFFICIENT TO MELT THE CONNECTOR AND DEGRADE THE WIRES TO BRITTLE.  I BELIEVE THIS IS A POSSIBLE FIRE HAZARD.  A NUMBER OF CO-OWNERS HAVE FOUND THE SAME DEFECT.    THE CONNECTION IN QUESTION  TERMINAL (C) GOES TO A GROUND DISTRIBUTION BLOCK THAT MIGHT NOT BE SUFFICIENT.
